name: Nutshell Analytics
author: Nutshell

sections.description:
This plugin integrates with Nutshell Analytics to track how people arrive at and interact with your site.

Get started by copying & pasting your Account ID in the plugin settings. You can find this ID number in the WordPress section in Nutshell’s integration settings.

Configure other Nutshell Analytics features in your plugin settings.
sections.changelog:
[2.4.2] – 2023-9-19

Removed

  • HubSpot integration

Added

  • Message to settings page
    [2.4.1] – 2023-02-06

Fixed

  • Elementor integration bugfix
    [2.4] – 2022-12-19

Added

  • Built-in integration for Elementor

Fixed

  • Existing built-in integrations not working
    [2.3.1.1] – 2022-11-21

Fixed

  • Prepends Nutshell ID with “ns-” identifier automatically
    [2.3.1] – 2022-10-12

Added

  • Inserts the Nutshell Analytics script on the site
  • Integrations for Hubspot, Gravity Forms, Ninja Forms and WooCommerce
